wikipedia_page.main: Edward James Glave (13 September 1863 – 12 May 1895) was an English travel writer and journalist, known for his multiple expeditions in the Congo Free State

response: * Edward James Glave (1863–1895), English travel writer

link_mentions.page: List of governors of Équateur (former province)

response: He replaced Casman, and in December 1885 was replaced by Edward James Glave.
Soon after, Liebrechts arrived to take over as station head, accompanied by Edward James Glave.
